title: Create ConfigMap from File
description: Create a file ||/tmp/app.conf|| with content ||'server.port=8080'|| and create a ConfigMap named ||file-config|| from this file in the ||mars|| namespace.

steps: kubectl get configmap file-config -n mars -o yaml

validations.command: kubectl get configmap file-config -n mars -o jsonpath='{.data.app\.conf}'
